::Shadow Wing::

She perched high up in a tree.  She looked out and saw the expansion 
of the forest open up in front of her.  She wondered how she and 
Lunarpine would ever make things work.  One minute, they were 
laughing and having fun.  And the next, trying to bite each other's 
heads off.  She knew that in the wild, wolves and owls mated for 
life.  But how one Cybertron would she make things work for her and 
Lunarpine, she had no idea.  She looked and saw the clouds moving 
quickly across the sky.  

She looked down and saw a rabbit hopping long the forest floor.
She shook her head, she wasn't in the mood to hunt. She knew 
Lunarpine needed to be in the company of other wolves.  She too, 
longed for the company of other owls.  She was willing to give that 
up for him.  But she knew that he would never give up being a wolf 
for her.  She would have to learn to just accept things as they were 
not what she wished they would be.  She felt, somewhere in her spark, 
that someday she might have to give up and let her wild wolf go free.
She somehow knew that that day would eventually come.  She let a tear 
roll off her cheek and down her beak.  "Wolves belong in the wild and 
need to be free. If need be, I'll give you that freedom Lunarpine." 
she said to herself.
